Boldly innovating to impact society and transform the world.
  • Robotics Giving Robots a Lighter Touch
  • Health, Environment Engineering a Solution to Dirty Water
  • Bioengineering Helping Babies Breathe

Personalize your path.

To address the complex challenges facing society, the next generation of engineering leaders need multiple areas of expertise. At Northeastern, you will benefit from an interdisciplinary and experiential education, expanding your window of knowledge and fueling innovation, while enabling you to personalize your journey.

Undergraduate Masters PHD Certificate

Become a multifaceted, global engineer capable of addressing 21st century challenges–and beyond.

Distinguish yourself with extensive industry experience.

World-Renowned Cooperative Education

With Northeastern's signature cooperative education program, you gain valuable industry experience as part of the academic curriculum. BS, MS, and PhD students have the opportunity to work with more than 700 leading employer partners around the world.

Watch the video

Impact tomorrow, today.

Experiential learning is the heart of a Northeastern education. Through a range of hands-on opportunities local and afar you will grow personally and intellectually, and be prepared to succeed.
